Name: Dragon Fruit (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the summer. Takes 17 days to grow into a small tree, and continues to produce multiple fruits after the first harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the summer. Takes 17 days to grow into a small tree, and continues to produce multiple fruits after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the summer. Takes 17 days to grow into a small tree, and continues to produce multiple fruits after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Sommer. Wächst in 17 Tagen zu einem kleinen Baum heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the summer. Takes 17 days to grow into a small tree, and continues to produce multiple fruits after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Plant these in the summer. Takes 17 days to grow into a small tree, and continues to produce multiple fruits after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Plant these in the summer. Takes 17 days to grow into a small tree, and continues to produce multiple fruits after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the summer. Takes 17 days to grow into a small tree, and continues to produce multiple fruits after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the summer. Takes 17 days to grow into a small tree, and continues to produce multiple fruits after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте летом. Через 17 дней вырастает невысокое деревце, которое и после первого сбора будет продолжать плодоносить.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Plant these in the summer. Takes 17 days to grow into a small tree, and continues to produce multiple fruits after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 夏天种植。 长成一棵小树需要17天，第一次收获后继续果实。
